## Co-Intelligence

<br>

The idea of using AI as a **collaborator** to achieve a human goal.

---

## 4 co-intelligent principles

<br>

{{< iconify mdi table-chair >}} always invite AI to the table  
 
::: {.fragment}
{{< iconify mdi human-greeting >}} be the human in the loop  
:::
::: {.fragment}
{{< iconify game-icons cook >}} treat AI like a person (but tell it what kind of person it is)  
:::
::: {.fragment}
{{< iconify mynaui rocket-solid >}} assume this is the worst AI you will ever use
:::
